definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]

sentences.english: The spiral section was part of the flight leading from the second to the third levels of the tower.
sentences.chinese: 這段螺旋梯屬於艾菲爾鐵塔第二層通往第三層的部份。

sentences.english: Every seven years the tower needs repainting.
sentences.chinese: 艾菲爾鐵塔每七年就得重新粉刷一次。

sentences.english: Modern structures make the Eiffel Tower look small in comparison.
sentences.chinese: 和現代建築物相比，艾菲爾鐵塔顯得小多了。

sentences.english: Wouldn't that be like Paris without the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 那會不會像是巴黎沒有了艾菲爾鐵塔？

sentences.english: A careful inspection of the image will further reveal that the bright object nearly below Venus is iconic Eiffel Tower.
sentences.chinese: 仔細看還會發現金星下面發亮的目標正是艾菲爾鐵塔。

sentences.english: Tatlin’s Tower would have dwarfed the Eiffel Tower in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 塔特林塔與巴黎的艾菲爾鐵塔相比就相形見拙了。

sentences.english: Two of France's most famous tourist attractions1 are the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.
sentences.chinese: 法國最著名的兩個觀光勝地就是艾菲爾鐵塔和羅浮宮。

sentences.english: Parents carried kids on their shoulders to an Eiffel tower exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 父母們將孩子放在肩頭出席艾菲爾鐵塔的展覽會。

sentences.english: I would fly to France to see the Eiffel Tower and to eat the French.
sentences.chinese: 我要飛到法國去看艾菲爾鐵塔和喫法國菜。

sentences.english: At 324 meters in height, the Eiffel Tower took only two years to build.
sentences.chinese: 三百二十四公尺高的艾菲爾鐵塔只花了兩年就蓋好。

sentences.english: The view of the top of the Eiffel Tower was obscured by the inclement weather.
sentences.chinese: 艾菲爾鐵塔的塔尖已經湮滅在了惡劣的下雪天中。

sentences.english: Cocteau, Jean. The Eiffel Tower Wedding Party.

definition: the name of various newspapers, notably Le Monde (France), El Mundo (Spain) and Die Welt (Germany)
Dresden, capital of Saxony 薩克森州|萨克森州[Sa4 ke4 sen1 zhou1], Germany
Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980
